name: R5-Flag-R4-Flag
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Flag into FHIR R4

element.display: Key information to flag to healthcare providers

target.display: Key information to flag to healthcare providers
target.comment: R5 `Flag` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag`
R5 `Flag.author` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Flag.author` - author has change due to type change: R5 `author` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `author`
R5 `Flag.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.category`

element.display: Coded or textual message to display to user

target.display: Coded or textual message to display to user
target.comment: R5 `Flag.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.code`
R5 `Flag.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.contained`
R5 `Flag.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.encounter`
R5 `Flag.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Flag.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Flag.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.id`
R5 `Flag.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Flag.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.implicitRules`

R5 `Flag.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Flag.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `Flag.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.meta`

R5 `Flag.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Flag.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Time period when flag is active

target.display: Time period when flag is active
target.comment: R5 `Flag.period` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.period`

R5 `Flag.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/flag-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/flag-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `Flag.subject` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Flag.subject` - subject has change due to type change: R5 `subject` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Flag.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Flag.text`
